attributes.action: STOP ALL BOATS FULL OFF MEN. EMPTY ALL HOTELS. Deportations NOW.
attributes.additional_details: Make uk great again it’s turning into a third world country. Try to put your own people first. Government are elected to serve the people of this country.
attributes.background: Stop putting 1000 of men in hotels of the boats coming in from every country. Most are not from war torn areas . No real man would leave behind women and children. Deport them back to there own countries. Hotels and accommodation housing should be for uk citizens only.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Shut the migrant hotels down now and deport illegal migrants housed there
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/718406
